name: Autonomous Agent Aramis
description:
AA Aramis is an attempt at taking ideas from auto-battlers into a single player game. You play as the operator of the autonomous combat agent Aramis and support their efforts in battle by managing several decks of cards through slot machines. 

It's a fairly small game, it wasn't greatly playtested and it mostly serves to display and test what I think are interesting ideas about realtime deck builders and single player auto-battlers. Hopefully the game managed to explain itself in the tutorials. I hope you enjoy it!

this game is available in english and portuguese

este jogo está disponível em inglês e português brasileiro
